docs.lead_paragraph: Seated on stools or standing at the head of operating tables, their features all but obscured by surgical masks, anesthesiologists until recently were only dimly perceived by patients, who thought of them simply as merciful dispensers of controlled unconsciousness.

headline.main: Health; NEW GUARDIANS IN THE OPERATING ROOM

docs.abstract: Laurence Cherry article on role and function of anesthesiologists and important developments in field; illus (L)
